<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H7739|שְׁוָה]]</big>**</small>
 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁוָה‎</span> **verb** (==be even, smooth==, see **Pi\`el**, hence) ==agree with, be like, resemble== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> II. ***make even, flat, uniform*** (with something else); Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁוָא‎</span> (derived species) ***be like***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be equal, fit, like***, Pa\`el ***lay out smoothly***, Aph\`el ***make plain, fit, worthy***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא שׁ‎</span> [[Job.33.27|Job 33:27]] (si vera lectio) ***it was not equalled to me***, i.e. (see infra; according to most) ***not requited*** (so [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Da|Da]], and [[Isa.16.6|Isa 16:6]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]]); [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵל לֹא שִׁוָּה‎</span> ***God did not requite*** (or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁלֵּם‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוה‎</span>); [[BDB#Du|Du]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא שִׁוָּה כַעֲוֺנִי‎</span> (compare [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]); ***Imperfect*** 1 singular of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלמִֿי ֗֗֗ אֶשְׁוֶה‎</span> [[Isa.40.25|Isa 40:25]] ***to whom shall I be like ?*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּדַמְּיוּנִי‎</span>), implying that he is incompare; 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא יִשְׁווּבָֿהּ‎</span> [[Prov.3.15|Prov 3:15]] ***are not comparable with her*** (wisdom), so [[Prov.8.11|Prov 8:11]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּןתִּֿשְׁוֶהלֿוֺ‎</span> [[Prov.26.4|Prov 26:4]] ***lest thou be like him*** (a fool); ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁוֶה בְּ‎</span> [[Esth.7.4|Esth 7:4]] ***is*** not ***an equivalent for***; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִ‎</span>, ***suitable for*** [[Esth.3.8|Esth 3:8]], so [[Esth.1.22|Esth 1:22]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] Or [[BDB#Ry|Ry]]<sup>Kau</sup> (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֹּל שֹׁוֶה עִמּוֺ‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּלְשׁוֺן עַמּוֺ‎</span>, but see [[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]].); ***adequate for*** [[Esth.5.13|Esth 5:13]]. **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁוָּה‎</span> [[Isa.28.25|Isa 28:25]] ***he hath levelled*** its (the ground's) surface; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁוִּיתִי וְדוֺמַמְתִּי נַפְשִׁי‎</span> [[Ps.131.2|Ps 131:2]] ***I have smoothed*** (composed) ***and stilled my soul***; so, that is <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַפְשִׁי‎</span> [[Isa.38.13|Isa 38:13]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] [[BDB#De|De]] and others; [[BDB#Houb|Houb]] [[BDB#Lo|Lo]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] and others read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁוַּעְתִּי‎</span> ***I cried***; accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׁפָּטִים‎</span> [[Ps.119.30|Ps 119:30]] ***accounted suitable***, ***meet*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּרֶךְ אֱמוּנָח בָּחָ֑רְתִּי‎</span>), [[BDB#Hi|Hi]], compare [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] v[[Ps.119.128|Ps 119:128]] (see **Qal** [[Esth.3.8|Esth 3:8]]); [[BDB#We|We]] inserts <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְנֶגְדִּי‎</span> (II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span>, compare [[Ps.16.8|Ps 16:8]]); Zenner [[BDB#Du|Du]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִזִּיתִי‎</span>. **Hiph\`il** ***make like: Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָח‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַשְׁוֶחלָֿךְ‎</span> [[Lam.2.13|Lam 2:13]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲדַמֶּה‎</span>); 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְמִי תְדַמְּיוּנִי וְתַשְׁווּ‎</span> [[Isa.46.5|Isa 46:5]] (compare **Qal** [[Isa.40.25|Isa 40:25]]). **Nithp.** (apparently) ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁתָּ֑וָה‎</span> (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁתְּוָה‎</span>) [[Prov.27.15|Prov 27:15]] ***are alike***, but read probably Niph\`al 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁוָ֑תָה‎</span> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75x»§ 75x</sup> Toy and others — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תשׁוה‎</span> [[Job.30.22|Job 30:22]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוא‎</span>. 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁוָה‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==set, place== (Biblical Aramaic Hithpa. [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁוָא‎</span> Pa\`el ***set, make*** (often [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁום‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁית‎</span>); [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] and others below I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span>, originally ***set, place***, then ***set together***, compare, &lt; weakened from original ***make even, right***, compare Vulgar Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> II. ***make*** (Wahrm, compare also [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ES 66</sup>)); — ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁוִּיתִי‎</span> [[Ps.16.8|Ps 16:8]] ***I have set*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> ***before me*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְנֶגְּדִּי‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵזֶר עַל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Ps.89.20|Ps 89:20]] ***I have placed strength upon*** a hero, compare [[Ps.21.6|Ps 21:6]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׁוֶּח רַנְלַי כְּ‎</span> [[2Sam.22.34|2Sam 22:34]] ***setting my feet like*** hinds = [[Ps.18.34|Ps 18:34]] (compare [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁוִּי כְּ‎</span> [[Gen.48.20|Gen 48:20]]; [[Jer.29.22|Jer 29:22]], for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂים כְּ‎</span>); — [[Isa.38.13|Isa 38:13]] see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוה‎</span>; — ***Imperfect*** = ***make, produce***, 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרִי יְשַׁוֶּה לוֺ‎</span> [[Hos.10.1|Hos 10:1]] (Israel as vine), si vera lectio, see [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשׂת פְּרִי‎</span> [[Hos.9.16|Hos 9:16]], compare [[Hos.8.7|Hos 8:7]]).
